messages.title: Ambitious for Cities of London and Westminster
messages.content: Vote Ibrahim Dogus for a visible, committed, dynamic voice for the community in parliament

messages.title: My commitment
messages.content:
Present in the constituency 
Visible in the community 
Speaking out without fear or favour 
Holding government to account for a hard Brexit and getting the best deal for London workers 
Fight for local NHS services and schools and seek solutions to rough sleeping and homelessness 
Campaign for the Mayor to clean up our toxic air.

community.content: Present in the constituency, visible in the community, speaking out without fear or favour

leaflet.personalStatement:
Dear Residents, 
Ibrahim Dogus, standing as your Labour candidate for Cities of London and Westminster. 
I'm a local entrepreneur and restaurant owner. I employ dozens of people and have founded three annual festivals that celebrate multicultural London. I am heavily involved in community and charity work. I am standing in this election because I think we need real economic competence and a focus on fairness and safety, and social responsibility.

politicalExperience.achievements: I employ dozens of people and have founded three annual festivals that celebrate multicultural London. I am heavily involved in community and charity work.

quotes.text: The kebab king of London has provided hot meals to emergency workers during the Westminster attack.
Meet the MPs’ favourite restaurateur: ‘Jeremy Corbyn and Owen Smith will get free pudding if they make up’
Restaurant owner fed emergency workers for free during Westminster attack
Restaurant owner kept doors open despite being ‘up to 500ft away’ from where Khalid Masood hit and then was shot.
The Kebab Awards founder plans to stand as an MP at the next election.
Kebab king of London talks beer and Brexit

images.caption: Vote Ibrahim Dogus for a visible, committed, dynamic voice for the community in parliament
Historic victory for Labour in City of London
